Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to track conditions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
